verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1189>beseech<s%> you, that I may <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G2292>bold<s%> when I am <S%G3918>present<s%> with that <S%G4006>confidence,<s%> <S%G3739>wherewith<s%> I <S%G3049>think<s%> to be <S%G5111>bold<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G5100>some,<s%> which <S%G3049>think<s%> of <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> if we <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> though we <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> we do <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4754>war<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the flesh: <S%G4561><s%>

(For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3696>weapons<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4752>warfare<s%> are <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4559>carnal,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1415>mighty<s%> through <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the pulling <S%G2506>down<s%> of <S%G3794>strongholds;)<s%>

Do ye look <S%G991>on<s%> <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the outward <S%G4383>appearance?<s%> If any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G3982>trust<s%> to <S%G1438>himself<s%> that he <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ's,<s%> let him <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3049>think<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G3754>that,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ's,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> are <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G5547>Christ's.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> <S%G5037><s%> I should <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G4055>more<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> hath <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G3619>edification,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2506>destruction,<s%> I should <S%G3756>not<s%> be ashamed: <S%G153><s%>
That <S%G2443><s%> I may <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1380>seem<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G302><s%> if I would <S%G1629>terrify<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1992>letters.<s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G1992>letters,<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G5346>say<s%> they, are <S%G926>weighty<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2478>powerful;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> his <S%G4983>bodily<s%> <S%G3952>presence<s%> is <S%G772>weak,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> his <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G1848>contemptible.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G5111>dare<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> make ourselves of the <S%G1469>number,<s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4793>compare<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> with <S%G5100>some<s%> that <S%G4921>commend<s%> <S%G1438>themselves:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G3354>measuring<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G1438>themseves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4793>comparing<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> among <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> are not <S%G4920>wise.<s%> <S%G3756><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> will <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> things without our <S%G280>measure,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3358>measure<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2583>rule<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G3307>distributed<s%> to <S%G2254>us,<s%> a <S%G3358>measure<s%> to <S%G2185>reach<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we stretch not ourselves <S%G5239>beyond<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1438><s%> our measure, as <S%G5613>though<s%> we <S%G2185>reached<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> we are <S%G5348>come<s%> as far <S%G891>as<s%> to <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> preaching <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

To preach the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the regions <S%G5238>beyond<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> and <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> another <S%G245>man's<s%> line of <S%G2583>things<s%> made ready to our <S%G1519>hand.<s%> <S%G2092><s%>
